h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: Entering the large temple complex, there's actually not as much to explore as you might think. A large open area to the right leads to a sealed building, but guarding it is a new enemy - the Yaksha Patroller.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Entering the large temple complex, there's actually not as much to explore as you might think. A large open area to the right leads to a sealed building, but guarding it is a new enemy - the Yaksha Patroller.
